lexUnit.name: commute.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: travel some distance between one's home and place of work on a regular basis.

sentence.text: Much credit for this transformation is given to team manager Barry Perkins , a genial and bespectacled Cockney who commutes each week between Richmond and the smoke .
